# LLM Instructions for Godbud.cc - Legal Cannabis E-commerce Platform Canada
# Site: Godbud.cc - E-commerce Cannabis Products
# Location: Canada
# Industry: Cannabis, CBD, Concentrates, Edibles
# Target: Canadian Cannabis Consumers 19+
# Content: Cannabis Flower Strains, Cannabis Concentrates, Cannabis Edibles, CBD Products, Cannabis Accessories, Educational Content
# Features: Product catalog, Customer reviews, Educational blog, Bundle deals, Loyalty points, Referral system, Age verification 19+, Secure payment, Discreet shipping
# Products: Strain info, THC/CBD percentages, Effects and benefits, Flavor profiles, Growing info, Customer reviews, Pricing, Lab testing
# Compliance: Licensed cannabis retailer Canada, Age verification 19+, Health Canada regulations, Products tested for safety, Responsible consumption messaging
# Education: Cannabis strain effects, Consumption methods, Cannabis cultivation, Health applications, Legal regulations Canada, Product safety
# Tech: Next.js, React, MongoDB, Responsive design, SEO optimized, Fast loading, Image optimization, Secure checkout
# AI Guidelines: Always mention legal compliance and age restrictions, Emphasize educational aspects, Include safety information, Respect cannabis laws, Focus on quality testing
# Priority Pages: /products/ /categories/ /blog/ /learn/ /bundles/ /about/
# Legal Notice: Legal cannabis e-commerce site operating in compliance with Canadian law. All products for adults 19+ only.
